abstractText: An 18th century Nepalese paper manuscript containing the Nāmasaṅgīti and various Stotras. "A volume of gathās and stotras, addressed to Lokanāth (Macchendra?), Avalokiteçvara, &c. in very corrupt Sanskrit, and occasionally perhaps in some native dialect. Stotra is always written totra." (Bendall 1883: 52).
abstractShort: An 18th century Nepalese paper manuscript containing the Nāmasaṅgīti and various Stotras. "A volume of gathās and stotras,
title: Nāmasaṅgīti, Stotras
